title: AAC安装失败报告求解
author: LoeGamingJoker
txt_content:
[23:15:54] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not load 'plugins\AAC-4.3.5 (1).jar' in folder 'plugins'

replies.author: HotPe_e
replies.txt_content:
如果你有spigot服务端建议拿来试试
因为不知道是否和aac兼容

replies.author: LoeGamingJoker
replies.txt_content: 还有没有更靠谱的大佬帮忙解答一下
